member.name: CADWORD
member.summary: Specifies a counted array of values that can be used to obtain the value corresponding to one of the predefined strings for a property.

member.name: CADWORD.cElems
member.summary: The size of the array pointed to by pElems.

member.name: CADWORD.pElems
member.summary: A pointer to an array of values, each of which can be passed to the method to obtain the corresponding value for one of the property's predefined strings. This array is allocated by the callee using and is freed by the caller using .
